alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Iron (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 12:05PM MDT until June 29 at 12:15PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 PM MDT FOR WEST CENTRAL GARFIELD AND EAST CENTRAL IRON COUNTIES... At 1204 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Panguitch, or 28 miles south of Junction, moving northeast at 10 mph. Around noon, a funnel cloud has been spotted within this storm. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters and Doppler Radar. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Panguitch. This includes US Route 89 between mile markers 132 and 143. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
